item.title: CVE-2024-49321|2024-10-21T11:11:02.034Z -- colorlib -- simple%20custom%20post%20order
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Colorlib Simple Custom Post Order allows Exploiting Incorrectly Configured Access Control Security Levels.This issue affects Simple Custom Post Order: from n/a through 2.5.7.
